name: vscode-apl-language-client
description: APL language client for VS Code
author: Gilgamesh Athoraya

aplLanguageServer.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

aplLanguageServer.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
